description: This walk covers part of Illawarra Escarpment State Conservation Area.

markers.description: Get the train to Stanwell Park using transportnsw.info.
The trail starts directly at the train platform.
From the platform trackhead follow the Wodi Wodi Track.
Watch for arrows and signs pointing out the rough bushtrail.
The track crosses a rocky creek. It's easy to miss the trail marker on the far side.
At the sign leave the Wodi Wodi track and follow the Forest Walk up the ridge.
Follow the walking track to the left along the top of the ridge.
Watch out for several small side trails leading to lookouts.
The trail intersects several fire trails. Watch for signs showing where the trail continues.
The trail ends at the Siblime Point Lookout and visitor centre.
The Sublime Point Track starts down the escarpment on the south end of the lookouts.
Follow the many stairs and steps down the escarpment to the forest below.
At the bottom of the climb follow the directions down the Gibson Track.
Follow the signs down the Gibson Track all the way to the trailhead.
From the tralhead follow Phillip Street back to the town centre and train station.
Plan your return trip from Thiroul at transportnsw.info.
